definitions: relating to the form or structure of things

examples.text: the purely morphological fact that with a little dam one could hold back a lot of water

shortDefinitions: relating to form or structure of things

definitions: relating to the branch of biology that deals with the form of living organisms, and with relationships between their structures

examples.text: studies of genetic variation of morphological traits in mammals
the geraniums have a number of unusual morphological adaptations

shortDefinitions: relating to branch of biology that deals with form of living organisms

definitions: relating to the forms of words, in particular inflected forms

examples.text: the language's phonological, morphological and syntactic structure
morphological and syntactic similarities between languages
